benchmark_details.name: IBACBench
benchmark_details.overview: IBACBench is the first benchmark for evaluating the synthesis and auditing capabilities of DePLOI, designed to test access control policy implementations, leveraging existing NL2SQL benchmarks and real-world policies.
benchmark_details.data_type: access control policies and SQL implementations

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the synthesis and auditing quality of access control implementations using policy representations based on IBAC-DB.

data.source: Synthetic generation using GPT-4 and real-world access control datasets.

methodology.calculation: Attribute Subset Execution Accuracy counts semantically equivalent but tuple-inequivalent answers as correct. F1 Score assesses compliance with access control policies.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better synthesis and auditing accuracy, with specific attention to capturing complex role and permission relationships.
methodology.validation: Validation through comparison against existing NL2SQL benchmarks.
